GameItemType.Description: A reflection on existence and the void beyond, meant as a reaction to the little-seen tome "Draginol's Journal On Space-Time." Some claim the author is a great channeler and adventurer who wove in and out of the great civilizations, even studying under the Titans for his time. Regardless, this rare volume is not sold, only lent for a maddeningly exorbitant fee. Nontheless its truths change lives, and the volume reveals new truths with every read.

GameItemType.Description: Written, supposedly, by a mysterious channeler who belonged to no one nation or faction. In it, he lays out the discipline of learning with an emphasis on humility, meticulous practice, and a mandate to walk many paths as teacher and student.
